channel.title: -DeriveScape V3 Source release!-
channel.description:
[size=15pt][b]^DeriveScape V3 Is Finaly here!^[/b][/size]
Note:[b]Please post on this topic if you read, or download[/b]
[img]http://r9.fodey.com/2033/bdbf1ebf10364f7cbdc98ea8c04f6b3f.0.gif[/img] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I've been working on V3 for about...3 weeks or somthing And I decided it was about time to release it so here it is,
[size=15pt][b]Pictures[/b][/size]
[b]NEW Home[/b]: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/27xklfr.png[/img] Home portals: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/33c3cdx.png[/img]
The old home sucks so I decided to go with a different approach to the new home Credits to tatemo for the area
[b]Shops:[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/21487k2.png[/img] [b] This is the brand new shops area made by me I made it because lots of people didnt like the allstarscape one New npcs and Items in shops for V4 :P
1v1pk:[/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2itj8kl.png[/img] I didnt like the Idea of the pkbox being 1V1 And I had to have a team area and a 1V1 area :p So I swapped them around
[b]FunPk[/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2mw8qqb.png[/img] Funpk...Seriously came out better then I thought Credits to silabsoft.org/smf For the tutorial (I made it so that you can move when you Die Lol XD)
[b]Train area:[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/3165fk9.png[/img] This is getting a definate change in V4
[b]NEVER BEFORE SEEN SKILL AREA(S)[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/70au5l.png[/img]
[b]Thats where the portal takes you[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/j6kheq.png[/img]
[b]Pkbox:[/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25ytx82.png[/img] this is also getting a change in V4 Because some people complained that It dc's Silab client
[b]Pkboat:[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/xoi15z.png[/img]
[b]Vengance[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vqqixy.png[/img]
Dbow hits double [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/16m0qbc.png[/img]
[b]yell requirment[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2e3yhky.jpg[/img] Basicly what this does is it stops AGF bot :S
[b]Credits[/b]
[b]silabsoft[/b] [b]Moparscape[/b] [b]tatemo[/b] [b]omfg banana[/b] [b]Mod allstar[/b] [b]Me[/b]
[b]Download:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/KJBBYL]http://uppit.com/KJBBYL[/url]
[b]ANY SERVER WITHOUT derivescape.no-ip IS FAKE[/b]

item.title: -DeriveScape V3 Source release!-
item.dc:creator: @pk_24_7 pk 24 7
item.description:
@pk_24_7 wrote:

LOL ur du[quote=“Linksbro, post:6, topic:255691”]“Making server history”

With a GSMINI in your server?
A GSMINI is the BIGGEST sign of a complete and udder failure in a server. Just the fact that you have one shows you can’t come up with a better mini-game then just kill…kill…kill…win. It also shows that you have only edited a basic all-star not much at all. Adding a few commands here and there, a few new placing here and there, maybe some NPC’s talking here and there, won’t make private server history. Think about it: The only servers that are “Making server history” are ones with 200+ online. I don’t think this would get 70 on at a time, seeing as players get bored to quick and leave.

Also: You’re “making server history”, but you can’t make a simple .gif, so you have to go to some overused website to make one with a snappy comedy line used in redneck stand-ups.

inb4 “wtf hav u releasded u retardd u havnt relesnt anthing noob”

I don’t release my work because it allows idiots to get a hold of it and degrade the image of yourself.

My 2 cents.[/quote]LOLZ U DUM IDIOT, u cant say that without backing it up with proof, that u are better…i doubt it…noob

Read full topic

item.title: -DeriveScape V3 Source release!-
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“java is my bitch., post:13, topic:255691”][quote author=satesql link=topic=337845.msg2622788#msg2622788 date=1231570209]
I think its more like your java’s bitch lol… I may get warned for speaking my opinion, but people on these forums, aren’t challenging themselves to actually learn java… It’s really not a hard language to learn, just takes a little effort, concentration to learn the conventions. Why release another all star piece of crap to the community? I’m sure people will just say great job ect, because they are just as lost as you when it comes to programming… It’s not your fault either, its the communitys fault for allowing these releases to get so popular… Doesn’t really matter though, I’m sure mopar makes a pretty penny from this website, so they probably don’t care… I agree 100% with linksbro on this one…
[/quote]I know java.
I just dont care for The newstyle sources.
I know thats what People Like but that isnt what appeals to me
So if you dont like it you can just gtfo my thread.

EDIT: also if it makes you retards feel any better I have a new project thats not “allstar”
So far I have wildy levels almost done and I’m working on the gs specs (pretty much done)
So…Hows that for some bad coding there mate.[/quote]

Since your gonna be hostile towards me, I’ll be hostile back… Tbh I don’t really give a shit about your topic you made, I’m just trying to send a message to this community that we need to change. We have enough idiots like you that are ruining this place… Show some script that you wrote yourself, and I’ll shut up…

Read full topic

item.title: -DeriveScape V3 Source release!-
item.dc:creator: @Linksbro Linksbro
item.description:
@Linksbro wrote:

x--Devil--x:

retard lets see u make a server plus ur flaming wen u make a server ill flame it hm? well show some respect noob

If you had read my full post, you would see I’ve already responded to this question:

I don't release my work because it allows idiots to get a hold of it and degrade the image of yourself.

Besides that, I’ve written many tutorials and have fully functional things inside my server.
I have made a GrandExchange which is a first of it’s kind.
I have made a new method of loading Global Objects, which allows for ease-of-use spawning them.
And I am working on a full castle wars in both 317 and 508.

Rep on these forums means nothing by the way.

Read full topic

item.title: -DeriveScape V3 Source release!-
item.dc:creator: @x_Devil_x1 x--Devil--x
item.description:
@x_Devil_x1 wrote:

[quote=“Linksbro, post:6, topic:255691”]“Making server history”

With a GSMINI in your server?
A GSMINI is the BIGGEST sign of a complete and udder failure in a server. Just the fact that you have one shows you can’t come up with a better mini-game then just kill…kill…kill…win. It also shows that you have only edited a basic all-star not much at all. Adding a few commands here and there, a few new placing here and there, maybe some NPC’s talking here and there, won’t make private server history. Think about it: The only servers that are “Making server history” are ones with 200+ online. I don’t think this would get 70 on at a time, seeing as players get bored to quick and leave.

Also: You’re “making server history”, but you can’t make a simple .gif, so you have to go to some overused website to make one with a snappy comedy line used in redneck stand-ups.

inb4 “wtf hav u releasded u retardd u havnt relesnt anthing noob”

I don’t release my work because it allows idiots to get a hold of it and degrade the image of yourself.

My 2 cents.[/quote] retard lets see u make a server plus ur flaming wen u make a server ill flame it hm? well show some respect noob

Read full topic
